caption.p: Chemistry of the coarse woody debris of Abies alba and Fagus sylvatica in the Salajka natural forest. ( A) pH, ( B) carbon to nitrogen (C/N) ratio, ( C) percentage of lignin, and ( D) ergosterol content. Different lowercase letters (designated aâ€“m in the panels) indicate significant differences between decay classes according to Tukey-Kramer HSD tests performed for each tree species independently ( p < 0.05). Gray Dots: outlier points.
